content: skip shell * repeat from * to * up to corner space 1sc 2ch 1sc in corner space ** repeat from ** to ** to start of the round slip_stitch into the top of the 1st single_crochet cut yarn and join shrimp in next chain space round 7 as round 5 cut yarn and join soft peach in the space between shells round 8 as round 6 cut yarn and join sage in next chain space round 9 as round 5 cut yarn and join storm blue in the space between shells round 10 as round 6 cut yarn and join pale rose in next chain space round 11 as round 5 cut yarn and join grape in the space between shells round 12 as round 6 cut yarn and join claret in next chain space round 13 as round 5 round 14 1ch 1sc in same place **3ch skip shell *1sc in next space 3ch skip shell * repeat from * to * up to corner space 1sc 2ch 1sc in corner space ** repeat from ** to ** to start of the round slip_stitch into the top of the 1st single_crochet cut yarn finishing weave in any remaining ends if needed block gently using the steam only from a hot iron to relax the fibres slightly or follow the recommendations for the yarn you are using a sandra paul/cherry heart original design © copyright 2018 all rights reserved page 1 0 of 1 0 this pattern remains the property of sandra paul/cherry heart designs at all times and is for your own personal use only please respect my work and do not copy reproduce redistribute or re-sell this pattern for more copyright information please see www cherryheart co uk/p/copyright
